summary: Diff adds an About section and a LegalSections component and wires them into the single-page App layout; it also rewrites marketing copy in multiple existing sections. However, the diff summary only clearly shows a #privacy legal section (with the rest truncated), and SiteHeader branding text appears inconsistent with the requested “AMS Digital Agency” naming.

missing_requirements.requirement: Legal sections with ids "#terms" and "#cookies" must exist in the DOM with complete, readable multi-paragraph policy text, and footer legal links must not be dead.
missing_requirements.reason: LegalSections.tsx is truncated in the diff summary and only explicitly shows a Privacy Policy block with id="privacy"; there is no visible evidence that "terms" and "cookies" sections (ids and full text) are implemented.

missing_requirements.requirement: All visible text in SiteHeader should be coherent and consistently branded as “AMS Digital Agency”.
missing_requirements.reason: SiteHeader logo/brand text shows “AMS Digital”, while other areas (e.g., footer and sections) use “AMS Digital Agency”, indicating branding is not fully standardized in the header.
